summary: A test suite that runs quick unit checks on a video‑to‑video stable diffusion pipeline, validating dummy component setup, input handling, output equivalence, batch consistency, image count per prompt, model persistence, default generation behavior, and attention module execution.
business_intent: Provide fast, automated verification of core pipeline functionality to catch regressions early and maintain confidence in the video‑to‑video diffusion model during development and continuous integration.
